overview:
Diane Szoke is an accomplished business executive, real estate professional and entrepreneur with a passion for building businesses.

As the former General Manager at Interbrand Wood, Diane has over 16 years of marketing and branding experience working on global brands such as Viagra, Prozac, Nissan Altima and Splenda to name a few.

Fusing her love of marketing and real estate Diane began her real estate career at Keller Williams Realty, the 3rd largest real estate franchise operation in the US.

In 2007, she founded Charleston Your Home (CYH) an award-winning Real Estate brokerage headquartered in Charleston, SC. CYH was singled out by industry experts for their exceptional Internet and Social Media marketing capabilities and was awarded the grand prize for â€œBest Websiteâ€.

Focused on the intersection of the Internet, and relocation, Diane founded relocalityÂ®, a stealth-mode internet based service that will disrupt the relocation landscape.
